name: What Makes Us
description:
What Makes Us is a children’s puzzle game themed around emotions. It was made as a first year group project for university.

Team Members

Kian - Programmer and 3D animator, created Fear, Anger and Envy levels.

Vic - 3D Environment and character artist, including concept art.

Elliot - Programmer, created Happiness and Sadness levels.

Emily - 2D and 3D character artist.

Laëtitia - 3D and 2D artist, created team portraits in the credits.

Harley - Level and UI designer and administration.

Abi - Level design.

Ethan - Design elements.
